name: Casio fx-CG Prizm Memory File
summary: Learn about .G3M files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: You will most likely only encounter G3M files when transferring data from or to an fx-CG Prizm series graphing calculator. The Casio FA-124 program allows you to transfer G3M files between your graphing calculator and PC using a USB cable. The fx-CG Manager PLUS Subscription program also allows you to emulate fx-CG series calculators and open G3M files.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
